figure.title: The Metadata submenu of the Image menu

sect2.para: Metadata are information about a document, embedded in the document. For GIMP, they are image metadata.

note.para: PNG, JPEG, TIFF and WebP preserve existing metadata.

You can set defaults to enable or disable exporting metadata in all affected file formats on whether you want complete privacy or not. Settings are available in Edit/Preferences/Image Import and Export/Export Policies.

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the image menubar through
Image Metadata .

sect3.title: The Metadata Submenu
sect3.para:
GIMP uses two plug-ins:
Metadata Viewer.
Metadata Editor.
